title: Improved Foliation Structure Pedagogy for Geological Structure Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geology and structural geology theories, foundational petrology
context.additional_context: Enhanced geology structure education methodology course for pre-service/in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can clearly explain the formation process of foliation structures and metamorphic conditions.
Learners can identify and correct common foliation-related misconceptions (e.g., fracture cleavage, flow cleavage) frequently encountered in literature.
Learners can analyze the relationship between bedding and foliation to apply it to field geological mapping and structural restoration.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
